text:
Watch the Cast of INTO THE WOODS Perform on TODAY

October 06, 2022



The cast of Into the Woods appeared on The TODAY Show this morning to perform the title song from the musical. The performance featured Stephanie J. Block, Sebastian Arcelus, Montego Glover, Krysta Rodriguez, Gavin Creel, Andy Karl, Katy Geraghty, Ann Harada, Kennedy Kanagawa, and Cole Thompson. Watch the video performance now! (more...)

Watch Lea Michele Perform 'Don't Rain On My Parade' on GMA

October 07, 2022



Watch a new video of Lea Michele singing 'Don't Rain On My Parade' from Funny Girl on Good Morning America! Michele stars in the revival as Fanny Brice alongside Ramin Karimloo, Jared Grimes, and Tovah Feldshuh. Michele also sat down for an interview before the performance, discussing mid-show standing ovations and being back on Broadway. (more...)

Creel & Karl Perform 'Agony' From INTO THE WOODS

October 06, 2022



Andy Karl and Gavin Creel appeared on The TODAY Show this morning to perform 'Agony' from Into the Woods. Creel currently stars as the Wolf and Cinderella's Prince in Into the Woods. Having briefly filled in for Creel in September, Karl will return to the production as Rapunzel's Prince on October 11. Watch the video performance now! (more...)

Watch ALMOST FAMOUS Cast Take Their First Broadway Bows

October 04, 2022



Previews began last night for Almost Famous at the Bernard B. Jacobs Theatre (242 W 45th St), the new musical featuring 15 Broadway cast debuts, with a book and co-lyrics by Academy Award® winner Cameron Crowe, based on his iconic film. Check out a photo and video clip from the curtain call here! (more...)

Andrew Lloyd Webber Addresses PHANTOM Closing on TODAY

October 04, 2022



Andrew Lloyd Webber appeared on The TODAY Show this morning to discuss bringing his new musical, Bad Cinderella, to Broadway. Webber also discussed the recent news that the Phantom of the Opera would be closing on Broadway. Watch videos of Andrew Lloyd Webber on TODAY and watch Linedy Genao perform 'Bad Cinderella' now! (more...)

Jennifer Hudson & Michael R. Jackson Announce Musical Collaboration

October 04, 2022



During the interview, the cast of “A Strange Loop” surprised Hudson with a video message, as Michael and Jennifer announced that they will collaborate on a reimagined version of the musical’s song “Boundaries” as a bonus track on the “A Strange Loop” cast album. Watch videos from Michael R. Jackson's visit to the Jennifer Hudson Show now! (more...)

Watch Highlights from 1776 on Broadway

October 06, 2022



Roundabout Theatre Company and the American Repertory Theater’s new Broadway production of 1776, directed by Jeffrey L. Page and Diane Paulus, is now in previews on Broadway and opens officially on October 6, 2022. Get a first look at highlights here! (more...)

Inside Opening Night of LEOPOLDSTADT on Broadway

October 03, 2022



Leopoldstadt, Tom Stoppard's Olivier Award-winning Best New Play, directed by two-time Tony Award nominee Patrick Marber, just opened on Broadway at the Longacre Theatre and BroadwayWorld was there! (more...)

ALADDIN'S Joshua Dela Cruz Stars in BLUE'S CLUES Movie Musical Trailer

October 04, 2022



Paramount+ has released the trailer for its upcoming original kids and family movie musical BLUE’S BIG CITY ADVENTURE. The film stars Aladdin's Joshua Dela Cruz and also features special star appearances by BD Wong, Ali Stroker, Taboo, Alex Winter, Phillipa Soo and Steven Pasquale. Watch the new video trailer for the upcoming musical film now! (more...)

COST OF LIVING Celebrates Opening Night on Broadway

October 04, 2022



Manhattan Theatre Club's Broadway premiere of the Pulitzer Prize-winning Cost of Living just opened at MTC's Samuel J. Friedman Theatre. Check out highlights from inside the big night! (more...)

OKLAHOMA! National Tour Performs on CORDEN

October 05, 2022



James Corden's dressing room check-in with the cast of the Oklahoma! National Tour took a turn when they revealed to him that they were actually the cast of 'Mila Kunis! the Musical,' leading them into a parody of the musical's title song. Sasha Hutchings and Sean Grandillo performed 'People Will Say We're In Love.' Watch videos now! (more...)

Gideon Glick Cooks Up a New Book- Give My Swiss Chards to Broadway

October 05, 2022



Gideon Glick is telling us all about his delicious new project- Give My Swiss Chards to Broadway, a Broadway-lover's cookbook! Watch the full video interview. (more...)

Watch Andrew Lloyd Webber Introduce His Next Broadway Musical, BAD CINDERELLA

October 04, 2022



Andrew Lloyd Webber officially announced the arrival of Bad Cinderella on Broadway, starring Linedy Genao in the title role. Performances will begin on Friday, February 17, 2023, at the Imperial Theatre (249 W 45th Street), with Opening Night taking place on Thursday, March 23, 2023. (more...)
title: VIDEO: Fifth Harmony Perform, Play 'Flinch' on LATE LATE SHOW Video

meta_data.description: On last night's LATE LATE SHOW, music guest Fifth Harmony performed 'He Like That' for the Stage 56 audience. Later, James invites the women of Fifth Harmony to play a game of Flinch.

twitter.title: VIDEO: Fifth Harmony Perform, Play 'Flinch' on LATE LATE SHOW
twitter.description: On last night's LATE LATE SHOW, music guest Fifth Harmony performed 'He Like That' for the Stage 56 audience. Later, James invites the women of Fifth Harmony to play a game of Flinch.
